name: Play Time (Huskydog Games)
description:
When the baby comes to play the toys run for their lives!

Play time is not as fun for the toys as it is the baby. Pulling, biting and new stitches needed every time. Fuzz the bunny has had enough. Time for the great escape! 

Jump over wooden building blocks and run away from Baby Marcus in order to join the free toys of the world. 

Use power ups, collect points and run the longest to earn your freedom. 

Play time is a 3D Side Scroller Race for your life.

This game demo was created in 48 hours by 1 Game Developer, Josh Coppinger (https://www.artstation.com/ethalthehusky)

Remember whatever you do … DON’T STOP RUNNING! 

Have Fun!
